analysis: The documents outline the order of succession for various cabinet positions in the event of death, resignation, absence, or sickness of the primary office holders. They specify who is authorized to perform the duties of the Secretary in different departments, such as Defense, Interior, Commerce, Treasury, Agriculture, Labor, Navy, Air Force, and Justice. The orders often revoke previous orders on the same subject and include exceptions for individuals serving in an acting capacity.
title: Cabinet Leadership Succession Protocols
